data.text: @SenatorLankford Is this you with anarchist Julie NoKings?  She raved about you. No surprise. You’re a rat In Republican clothing.  POS https://t.co/P7Xozh8Gx0

@SenatorLankford Guys, bring the “Save America Act” to the floor of the senate next week, make the democrats talk, make the democrats perform the real talking filibuster, vote on the bill,which can now be passed by a 51 vote of Republicans, send it to President Trump’s desk for his signature.
@SenatorLankford Did you know that @elonmusk tried to fuck children on Epstein island and you still praised his work with @DOGE ?

@SenatorLankford That would be the first thing you’ve ever passed. I’m sure you negotiated with Chuck U Schumer. And it will be a turd like everything else you’ve done. No thank you Pastor Senator. We don’t trust you.

@SenatorLankford It means nothing. Until we get rid of ENEMIES OF THE REPUBLIC, like yourself,Thune,McConnell,Grassley,Collins, etc.,this crap will continue. You should PASS the Save Act,that will rid us of MANY democrat psychopaths,& hopefully RINOs. https://t.co/q3cIk72lHQ
@SenatorLankford Senator when will you realize wasting money means nothing to politicians. Nothing makes any difference except more power and money for politicians, their donors and the party.

@SenatorLankford You can save money by auditing Social Security SSI program for fraud and fix the issues that allow it. Stop letting illegal aliens collect money for their children born in the United States by walking into government offices to do business.
